questions.question: What is the predominant color of the container holding the product?
What material appears to compose the main body of the product's container?
What is the overall shape of the product's primary packaging?
What color is the cap or lid situated atop the product container?
Considering the product's visual texture, what is the appearance of the substance inside?
What is the apparent primary color present on the product label?
What type of material does the product's label seem to be printed on?
Based on the image, what is the apparent texture of the product's container?
Judging by the image, is the product contained in a single, unified container?
Does the product's container show any visible imperfections or cracks?
What appears to be the print style on the product's label (font style)?
Describing the container's closure, is it screw-on or snap-on?
What is the visible orientation of the product label on the container?
Considering the image's perspective, is the container shown full or partially empty?
Does the visible product labeling include any apparent certifications or logos?
